title: Earn MATIC tokens on 40 ETH deposit
body:
We can earn MATIC tokens by depositing the DAO's ETH into an InstaDapp account and leveraging the ETH (borrow and depositing using the "Leverage MATIC" strategy). Currently, the MATIC earnings can be as high as 30%, but we expect this number to drop on June 14th. See NOTE below.

Steps:
1. Move 40 ETH to a Metamask wallet on Polygon L2. (Single signer)
2. Deposit ETH into InstaDapp account controlled by the MetaMask wallet.
3. Use the "Leverage MATIC" strategy to generate positive APY. (If the MATIC drop changes so that we would lose money, we will not leverage the funds and just leave in the deposit as if it were a savings account.)

The DAO will check on the account on a weekly basis.

NOTE: 
"The MATIC rewards for the liquidity mining program will be distributed in two phases: Polygon will pay out 0.5% of the total supply from today until Jun. 14, and another 0.5% between Jun. 14 and Apr. 13, 2022"

RISKS:
- The MATIC incentive will end and the yield will drop or become negative (loss) temporarily.
- InstDapp failure or hack
- Polygon system failure or hack
- Human error on transferring the tokens
- It will take 2-3 hours to return the ETH on Polygon back to ETH Mainnet

EST. COSTS:
~$20 to move funds to Polygon (depending on gas)
~$20 to move funds off Polygon back to ETH Mainnet
author: 0x4558e88C5a972244c995AE4DD95a84fc790355f9
